snippet: A note on the latest episode said investigators’ pressure on the director violated “the main principle of a documentary of high quality: the author should not be a participant of the events.”
abstract: Creators of documentary film series The Term, which is about Russia's opposition leaders, announce that they will halt project after police raided home of film's director.
lead_paragraph: A note on the latest episode said investigators’ pressure on the director violated “the main principle of a documentary of high quality: the author should not be a participant of the events.”

headline.seo: Documentary Filmmakers in Russia Halt ‘Term’ Series
headline.main: Filmmakers Halt Work on Russian Opposition Documentaries After Raid
